bach.DataFrame.from_model¶

classmethod DataFrame.from_model(engine, model, index)[source]¶

Instantiate a new DataFrame based on the result of the query defined in model.

This will create and remove a temporary table to asses meta data for the setting the correct dtypes. In order to create this temporary table the query in model executed.

Parameters

  • engine (sqlalchemy.engine.base.Engine) – an sqlalchemy engine for the database.

  • model (sql_models.model.SqlModel) – an SqlModel that specifies the queries to instantiate as DataFrame.

  • index (List[str]) – list of column names that make up the index. At least one column needs to be selected for the index.

Returns

A DataFrame based on an SqlModel

Return type

bach.dataframe.DataFrame
